title: Bug 11280 - [View Management] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 
2. Double-click the title bar to maximize the view. 
3. Switch to the resource perspective. 
4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
